headline: Automata Raises $45M Series C to Build the Operating System for AI-Ready Labs
summary: LONDON, January 29, 2026--Automata, the lab automation company building fully integrated, AI-ready platforms for life sciences, today announced the close of a $45 million Series C funding round led by Dimension with participation from Danaher Ventures, Tru Arrow Partners, Octopus Ventures, Entrepreneurs First, and others. The round also includes a strategic investment partnership with Danaher Corporation, with Murali Venkatesan Ph.D., Global Head of Danaher Ventures and Vice President of Science

The round also includes a strategic investment partnership with Danaher Corporation, with Murali Venkatesan Ph.D., Global Head of Danaher Ventures and Vice President of Science

headline: DHR Q4 Deep Dive: Bioprocessing and Diagnostics Drive Steady Performance Amid Muted End Markets
summary: Diversified science and technology company Danaher (NYSE:DHR) met Wall Streets revenue expectations in Q4 CY2025, with sales up 4.6% year on year to $6.84 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $2.23 per share was 1.8% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Danaher annual profit declines but sales improve on stronger quarter
